<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pillow Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1300)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 42

**Price** 80 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The shield's blue enameled face is cool to the touch, and displays the moon's current phase at night. When you lay your head on the reverse side of this [steel shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 6, HP 36, BT 18), it becomes as pliant and supportive as the best pillows. If you complete a period of rest using the _pillow shield_, you can choose to transfer your recovery to the shield. Instead of [recovering a number of Hit Points after resting](/Rules.aspx?ID=472), the shield is restored an equal number of Hit Points instead.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> command, envision;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The shield creates an area of vigilance. It casts [_alarm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=7) centered on itself; you decide whether it creates a mental alarm or an audible alarm. The alarm goes off at the end of the spell's duration or when triggered as normal, whichever comes first.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Pillow Shield
